mapper.select: SELECT m.perms FROM qiu_role r LEFT JOIN qiu_user_role ur ON (r.role_id = ur.role_id) LEFT JOIN qiu_admin u ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN qiu_role_menu rm ON (rm.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN qiu_menu m ON (m.menu_id = rm.menu_id) WHERE u.username = #{username} AND m.perms is not null AND m.perms <> ''

SELECT m.* FROM qiu_menu m WHERE m.type <> 1 AND m.MENU_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id FROM qiu_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN qiu_role r ON (rm.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN qiu_user_role ur ON (ur.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN qiu_admin u ON (u.id = ur.user_id) WHERE u.username = #{username} ) ORDER BY m.sort
